description_html:
Drawing upon diverse textile techniques from around the world, the Stinson Studio combines them to spark something new -Fusion- a bold and complex collection of new performance fabrics that will make modern interiors dynamic.

Fusion brings together a diverse mix of product surfaces that designers crave for their interiors- oversized graphic taffeta, varying pattern scale, intricate details, cut pile plush velvet, aggressive boucle texture and lustrous metallics.

Fusion is at once both modern and timeless.

All patterns exceed 100,000 rubs – heavy duty

9 textiles / 85 colors
